await ibt.mint(deployer.address, ethers.utils.parseUnits("77",18));
await ibt.burn(deployer.address, ethers.utils.parseUnits("1000",18));
await ibt.mint(deployer.address, ethers.utils.parseUnits("1000",18));
console.log(deployer);
const deployer = await ethers.getSigner();
const ibt = await IBT.attach(contractAddress);
const IBT = await ethers.getContractFactory("IBT");
